column4: Original Text
column5: Translated Text [es]

column4: Wanna try the mini game?
column5: [es]Wanna try the mini game?

column4: Sure!
column5: [es]Sure!

column4: No..
column5: [es]No..

column4: Wanna try it again?
column5: [es]Wanna try it again?

column4: The DRINKS have been added to your inventory. Deliver them to Klangarussell so the show can start!
column5: [es]The DRINKS have been added to your inventory. Deliver them to Klangarussell so the show can start!

column4: Hi
column5: [es]Hi

column4: Wanna try the game again?(You wont get anything)
column5: [es]Wanna try the game again?(You wont get anything)

column4: I’m so excited to know that I’ll watch Klangkarussell play in real life!
column5: [es]test I’m so excited to know that I’ll watch Klangkarussell play in real life!

column4: Why hasn’t Klangkarussell’s show started?
column5: [es]Why hasn’t Klangkarussell’s show started?

column4: The show should have started long ago though. Do you know what may be causing the delay?\n
column5: [es]The show should have started long ago though. Do you know what may be causing the delay?\n

column4: You bought a BRAND NAME and drank it. You feel energized and can now hold the B button to move faster!
column5: [es]You bought a BRAND NAME and drank it. You feel energized and can now hold the B button to move faster!

column4: It’s a shame that Klangkarussell hasn’t started to play. Some people heard that they are waiting for something.\r\n
column5: [es] It’s a shame that Klangkarussell hasn’t started to play. Some people heard that they are waiting for something.\r\n

column4: If only someone could talk to them to check what’s happening…
column5: [es]If only someone could talk to them to check what’s happening…

column4: Finally someone shows up! We haven’t been able to begin our show because we need help with something. Could you please help us?
column5: [es]Finally someone shows up! We haven’t been able to begin our show because we need help with something. Could you please help us?

column4: You made it! These are the drinks we ordered!
column5: [es]You made it! These are the drinks we ordered!

column4: As a thank you gift for helping us, we would like you to have our unique and special ULTIMATE ARCADE TOKEN.
column5: [es]As a thank you gift for helping us, we would like you to have our unique and special ULTIMATE ARCADE TOKEN.

column4: Did you get our beer?
column5: [es]Did you get our beer?

column4: Yes
column5: [es]Yes

column4: No
column5: [es]No

column4: I’m glad you’re willing to help us!
column5: [es] I’m glad you’re willing to help us!

column4: That is not the proper attitude to have during the festival. Remember to be kind to others!
column5: [es]That is not the proper attitude to have during the festival. Remember to be kind to others!

column4: It allows you to play unlimited times on the arcade machines.
column5: [es]It allows you to play unlimited times on the arcade machines.
